quote: So his mother’s brothers said this in his behalf to all the leaders of Sheʹchem, and their hearts were inclined to follow A·bimʹe·lech, for they said: “He is our own brother.”
Every moving animal that is alive may serve as food for you. Just as I gave you the green vegetation, I give them all to you.
and he said to them: “Carry nothing for the trip, neither staff nor food pouch nor bread nor money; neither have two garments.
